website_summaries.verdict: These buds provide an excellent battery life with a great range for bluetooth. Ergonomic design is easy to use.
pros: Notable for their water-resistant and sweat-proof design
Offer approximately 4.5 hours playback time from one charge
Touch buttons are easy to use
cons: May be too large for some ears

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am very pleasantly surprised by this product. I am an owner of apple AirPods and got these as a extra set just in case my AirPods break down. Now it seems the AirPods will be the extra set. These sound much much bette! Deeper punchy bass, very vivid vocals, and a surround sound stage. Very nicely balanced. I would say these are the best sounding earbuds I’ve tried. They stay inside your ear no matter what as they come with anti drop accessories that work very well and it’s not possible to shake them off. Battery is outstanding as well. Do yourself a favor and buy these instead of spending 200$ for Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: Like them!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound! I worried a bit about how would they fit in the ear, but they have a lot of different tips inside, so I easily chose the best size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia

customer_reviews.title: I have struggled through a myriad of truly wireless ear buds and have always been disappointed - mostly for the common reason of not staying ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this week - first impression... WOW! As have many, I have struggled through a myriad of truly wireless ear buds and have always been disappointed - mostly for the common reason of not staying in place. Many would sound OK, but would required constant readjustment to sound reasonable. These TREBLAB X2 are in a completely different class and are absolutely AMAZING...so far. They are bit more expensive than many of the other models, but well worth it. They stay perfectly put in your ears and sound fabulous - even during a hard gym workout! You will not regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: K and L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These pair of earbuds are truly revolutionary! I use them every single, and they help me incorporate great music in my everyday activities. I listen audio books on my way to work (the quality makes me feel like I'm actually sitting next to the narrator:), I use them when I'm at the gym, and even at the pool; they do not fall out when I run, they are resistant to sweat and water. The sound is great, and I can answer calls with them. They look cool too! I bought my earbuds in white, and many people complemented me on how futuristic my headphones look. Very happy with my purchase and my new sound:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buds so far
customer_reviews.text: These are the third set of wireless buds and are so far the best i have every experienced. The sound quality is very good. The charging block is great compared to others I have tried. The fit is good and so far they stay in place while working out. Charge life is better than any other I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bill English

customer_reviews.title: TRULY AMAZING true wireless earphones in every way
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are truly revolutionary! TRULY AMAZING true wireless earphones in every way. I’ve never had headphones that sounded so good and I had them all including Bose, Samsung, AirPods (all were returned) Also, they include 3 sets of anti-drop fins and they actually work and earbuds don’t fall out! I ran a few miles with them and went to the gym, they didn’t budge. Another cool feature is the charge box which fully recharges the earphones making the use time at least 10 hours. OVERALL BEST HEADPHONES I HAD- Treblab has outdone them selves with this product!! GET YOURS NOW before they raise the price!
customer_reviews.author: vladik

customer_reviews.title: Sound is excellent,Charging dock no longer connects with earphones,now useless
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase .They operate like they’re supposed to and I am very happy and highly recommend them.One ,maybe two little things are the sticks the protrude but it’s not a beauty contest,kind of a Star Treck look. 12/16/18 update the earphones I love but I cannot theCHEAP charging dock.This is the third set of Bluetooth ear/headphones where the charging dock connections are so delicate that they no longer charge ,buy the warranty or stay away it’s a shame I likes]d the sound.1/22/19 update Productech replaced the charger and charging wire,because of the quality of the sound and now the quality of customer service I highly recommend the product especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Wireless and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Best set of wireless bluetooth headset I ever bought!!! The sound is amazing and they last right around 9-10 hours from a full charge as well!!! Absolutely love them and will purchase a back up set as well :).
customer_reviews.author: Perry Staten

customer_reviews.title: Hey guys just found a minute to write how excellent are this headphones what i’v got just today
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys just found a minute to write how excellent are this headphones what i’v got just today. Pur sound, hearing and super comfortable. Comes with 3 sizes of earbuds. Very nice headphones. I love them a lot. Much better product then apple headphone. And for this price they just perfet. Phone call is clear to.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Buy these add to cart
customer_reviews.text: If there was a half star I would have gave them a 4.5 stars these are great cordless bluetooth headphones-once you get used to the controls and the little charger pack you will love these--my only gripe would be I wish they would ditch the lanierd thing it's is suppose to attach to the charger which I feel is useless who is going to carry their headphones attached to a charger on a lanierd instead have a small bag to put the headphones and little charger in other than that these are amazing great for the gym you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: all perfect. I saw AirPods in the store the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you these are some serious wireless headphones guys.The sound is perfectly balanced with a stage right in front of your head. Just exquisite. I smiled when I saw the 3D audio remark but they weren’t kidding, the sound does sound three dimensional and hits you from all sides. The look the feel the weight, all perfect. I saw AirPods in the store the other day and these feel and sound like the next level from that. All at fraction of the price. I don’t know how they can offer this quality for this much, but it is what it is. Great job on these bad boys Treblab!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: music great! Phone calls, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these sound for music and movies. and for me they are very comfortable. right now the only Con I have found is phone calls. every call they complain about my voice. "you sound like your far away" i use these for work mostly as i am always on the move and not much time at a desk. also the phone call audio only comes out of the right ear even if i have both on. Probably just hold on to these as a backup but i will need to find something better for calls.
customer_reviews.author: Dino P

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit. The range is way better than my previous ones. My wife is liking them so much that I will have to buy her a pair. A+
customer_reviews.author: Big Rob

customer_reviews.title: Treb Lab = Incredible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are competitive for the price in this market but the product is only a fraction of why they are worth it. The customer service team at Treb Lab is phenomenal and have a life long customer in me.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product, very durable, and awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of treblab and I can’t recommend them enough. This is the second set I have ordered, and after two years the first set was still working perfectly (gave them to my girlfriend). I am a city employee so I am always sweating and covered in dirt and dust (and much worse). I dropped the headphones getting out of the truck one day and they sat on the ground outside for over a week through rain and more before I found them, to my amazement there was no change in how well they worked. The best quality for the price that I could find. In conclusion and as I stated before, I cannot recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome headphones. They are probably the best set I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome headphones. They are probably the best set I have ever owned. They never fall out of my ears (which I think is a first), they have great sound, and pause/play, volume, and track controls are all available on the buds. I have had occasional issues with the left bud going in and out, and sometimes I think they don't turn off automatically when placed in the charger (I make sure to manually turn them off before putting them in), but these are minor grievances overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Great fit! Needs a solid case for transit!
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic! The sound is great. The fit is great. The battery life is....Great!! My only beef with these is the lack of a secure case for which to store them in between use. When I take them to work or the gym, 9 out of 10 times I have to reattach the ear tips because they just pop right off during transit. I'm purchasing a small hard case from Amazon to see if that'll help my small dilemma. The sound is about 90% on par will my Bose Bluetooth earphones. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Grandson (teenager) approved!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for our grandson. I am impressed with this company's attentiveness. They have contacted me twice, since purchase, to inquire about our happiness with their product. We have no regrets choosing these Bluetooth Earbuds. High end quality at a decent and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Nana of 4

customer_reviews.title: Works correct most of the time, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: The main issue I have with these is that they regularly get off sync. I will be listening to them for a while and then there is a gradual and noticeable delay between the headphone earbud sync. It starts to sound like an echo as they are about 1/2 a second apart at its worst. The sound itself it top notch. Because turing off and on the headphones gets them back in sync, the issue is fairly easy to resolve but is extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: ViceP

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound great product
customer_reviews.text: I had a little difficulty with the ear phones when I first got them. I contacted customer support and they immediately got back to me and helped me solve the problem. Since then the earphones have sounded great. Excellent sound quality. You can’t turn up the volume too loud because these things get loud about halfway with no distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twice Bitten
customer_reviews.text: These things don't work. I'm on my 3rd set. The first time I received to left side earbuds, the second set worked for 3 weeks and suddenly stopped acting a charge. There is absolutely no way to contact Treblab except by e-mail, no way to have a real-time conversation as everything is on a 24 hour delay. If this set doesn't work, I'm done. Note to Treblab: People don't mind paying for QUALITY. I'd pay twice the price for a earbud set that is rugged and tough and works right out of the box. I hate dealing with JUNK. It would also be great to have a technical department that can be reached in real time via phone or chat.
customer_reviews.author: William Rippy

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review:  great sound, wonky battery
customer_reviews.text: Update to a previous review: While initially I had some issues with the battery and charging, I am impressed with how the company responded to the concern. They were very proactive and quick in working with me to solve the problem. The fit is good, and I'm not sure why some folks have such trouble getting them in their earrs - the fin seems odd, but it holds in place through all kinds of activity. The sound is the best I've had in ear buds. The controls take a bit of getting used to, but when you've slimmed the design down to have only 4 recessed buttons, having the buttons do multiple tasks is expected.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They work really well with my iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They work really well with my iPhone 8+ and the range is terrific. Battery life is better than I expected - lasted for nearly an entire 5 hour airline flight. There are many choices for ear buds and ear wings, but I find that with the right size earbud covers I don't need the wings at all, the buds are very secure. They are also comfortable for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the X2’s for 16 months without an issue, until recently. When using my X2’s to send a voice text, the left ear bud loses connectivity.. I have to reboot the left ear bud every time I try this.. Otherwise they are amazing earbuds👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I've come to loathe these
customer_reviews.text: The left one simply turns itself off after a few seconds. I spent an awful lot of money for something that gives the same performance as the old earphones I used on a transistor radio when I was a kid. But wait, it gets worse. The Bluetooth has stopped working entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rose Kiesel

customer_reviews.title: These ear buds are AMAZING! I bought them for my boyfriend as a ...
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are AMAZING! I bought them for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift and he loves them! They don't slip, they have deep clear sounds, the can charge and carry them on the go, it's all around great!
customer_reviews.author: Makamae Recca

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear buds.. They fit perfectly and the sound quality is fantastic. One problem that I have is that randomly the left side disconnects for a few seconds. It doesn't happen often... Still willing to give it 5 stars. Out of the box easy to pair with my phone. Listening to music is incredible with these. Overall I recommend these earbuds. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: John Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed since I own other treblab products that were much better
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with these, the Battery lasts about 15 minutes on a full charge they keep disconnecting and I found the sound quality poor, I own a pair of the treblab XR800s that I bought ove a year ago the sound quality is much better and the battery lasts for days, I wouldn't recommend these you get what you pay for as of now I contacted them but haven't heard from them since I just contacted them but will update when I hear from them. Maybe I just got a defective pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless earphones!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write product reviews, however these are amazing earphones. The sound quality is great, I wear them at work everyday. I was specifically looking for a pair that had long range and battery that would get me through most of the day before needing to be charged. Well I found it all in this product. The battery will last half the workday, and charges up in 15 minutes. I can walk all around our main office and still hear my music. Perfect investment for what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Guzman

customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! The ear buds look and sound amazing! Very clear audio, great bass. Simply love them all around. Would recommend for sure. Great job Treblab, great product for a good price. Best regards, Helder.
customer_reviews.author: Helder Lauriano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound! Great design
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound! Great design. The only set of wireless earbuds that i have ever used that actually stay in my ears no matter what! They do stick out slightly from your head but they don't look bad. My only complaints are that the pairing system is a little annoying and the ear tips are very hard to get on but those are small issues and in my opinion they still get a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Regarding the TrebLab X2 @ the 50/60-ish price point, ...
customer_reviews.text: Regarding the TrebLab X2 @ the 50/60-ish price point, the earbuds deliver on sound quality and fidelity. The look is goofy compared to the market leader Apple Airpods. At a 1/3 the price, this is understandable and for me, it doesn't deviate from the under experience. What made me dinged the TrebLab X2 for two stars resulting in a 3/5 rating was the user experience was negatively impacted for me because of the sketchy linkage between the left and right earbuds. The user experience was further exacerbated by the sketchy Bluetooth linkage to my iPhone 7S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are probably the best I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Had been using an LG Tone sport band for the last year, and the right ear bud started to cut out and lose power, so I figured it was time for something new. These headphones are probably the best I've ever bought, especially for working out. Very comfortable, sound is amazing. Like others have said, my only complaint would be that the bass isn't the best, but other than that I do not regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Worth the price. Love them. Use them daily. Best quality of any I have tried, and I have tried 8-10 different ones for myself or for family gifts. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but returned due to failure
customer_reviews.text: Had read the reviews so thought I'd give them a try. They sound fantastic, they did not fall out while running (anywhere between 1-10 miles on avg) and seemed pretty easy to sync up. That's the good. Then...the left ear piece stopped connecting. Turn everything off, then back on, and it would connect again. Then...the left ear piece stopped working altogether. I just returned them. I didn't feel like swapping them out and trying again, so I just bought a different pair from a local store to avoid all the mailing back and forth. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdiness of the earbuds. I think the different size silicone buds are great and they allow for the best fit of any earphones, buds, etc., I've ever tried. The battery life is good and I'm hoping as I use the product more battery life will remain consistent. I'm trying to follow the instructions, which were also very good, to be consistent in the way I use the charger. Not used on any incoming calls, so I cannot comment, but expect no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Early Adopter

customer_reviews.title: Good sound,
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, These are good earbuds, but they have 1 main issue: - the charger, encasement. The buttons are exposed so it is very easy to touch them and waste the charge. There is no indicator for the charge level, so you don't know whether you have enough juice even for a short flight. ---- I changed my review from the short battery life, after following the instructions from the manufacturer, it is now lasting 3 and more hours.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Returned 2x
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these on two occasions. One time they wouldn't pair to each other, so sent it back. Second time the new set wouldnt had horrible sound quality for phone conversation which was the main reason he got them. Too bad because they look cool. I ordered him the same cheapy ones I was using and he still has those and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The left ear piece constantly disconnects and reconnects whenever I move. If I am sitting in one spot it’s okay but as soon as I move I hear the sound go out and then reconnect whenever I am still again. I’m really disappointed because I bought these for working out. Also, if you have smaller ears be aware of the dimensions. These jut out pretty far from my ears and look a tad awkward. I would be willing to put up with this if they only worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mayae

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are nice and the noise cancellation and sound quality is really good but I wouldn't recommend for working out because these headphones do not stay in my ears good and I have the smaller headphone pieces. Also sometimes I have problems where my headphones just disconnect I don't know if its due to bad connection or if its something actually wrong with my headphones but Im no longer covered under warranty so I just have to deal with that issue. Customer service is a A+ because I always gotten a quick response from them and they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriece Stringfield

customer_reviews.title: Treblab x5 Customer Svcs.
customer_reviews.text: After posting my review on the Treblab x2 the company sent me a hand written note from owner wanting me to try again. I was really impressed with that so, I tried Treblab x5 . The sound, quality, is great. I would recommend these if you use them for music the sound quality is great. They fit in the ear really well, they stay charged a long time and I didn't have to try and connect them. They work soon as I took it out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great bass!
customer_reviews.text: The bass on the Treblab X2 is great as it is very clear! The battery life is better than a lot of the other wireless ear buds as well. The only thing that I may have had a problem with the Treblab X2 is the call quality. The other person that I called stated that I came in low, however, this can be a problem with reception and not so much the Treblab X2's. I will try again with the calls and go from there. Regardless of the call situation, I still highly recommend the Treblab X2!
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Treblab is a great company
customer_reviews.text: This product is very affordable, easy to set up for use, and compatible with all of my electronics. The battery life is outstanding and the sound clarity is excellent for the price point. I have used several Teblab products before, but I believe this is the best product that they have produced to date.
customer_reviews.author: Myke Sampayo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a musician and was very hesitant about buying these. They fit great. I didn't use the circular thingys. They bother my ear. The sound is fantastic! Rich bass without being thumpy sounding and clear, strong mid tones as well. Great investment and easy, easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've ever had. The quality is great and the sound is amazing. It would be helpful if the earbuds openings we're a tad bigger. They're very hard to get onto the headphones. This caused a friend of mine who bought these to break them. if there's a secret or a tip to doing this it would be helpful if they posted a video on YouTube or here.
customer_reviews.author: mhoward205

customer_reviews.title: This item is simply annoying. It randomly turns on whille in the holder ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is simply annoying. It randomly turns on whille in the holder and in my bag connecting to devices so it can be on for hours using battery so when i pull it out and need it fully charged it isnt. Also when i want to quickly connect another device it will have connected so i have to stop dig in my bag to turn them off. Not a convenient item. THE ONLY REASON I GAVE A THREE IS THE SOUND IS AMAZING!!!! Otherwise would have given a 5. But ive stopped taking them on my commutr because theyre troublesome in favor of a cheaper item with inferior sound but they aren't a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: + build in microphone + a lot off additional things to adjust for any ears size + pretty good sound quality for the price + superhelpfull member care - difficult to understand how to use all the functions with 2 buttons for each ear - depends of device left ear sometimes loses the connection (iPhone 6s - works good, iPhone 5s not always good) Overall: pretty good for 30-40$ but too expensive for 70$
customer_reviews.author: anton

customer_reviews.title: these really stay in your ears.
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. The fit is great, they're not coming out, the sound is great. The one thing that could be improved is there is a delay when watching Netflix or YouTube. I'm sticking with the the them because I like them for listening to music enough to overshadow the streaming delay.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Beach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Earphones have good quality of sound. Comes with a microphone and call management system. Earbuds are designed to stay in ears. Even during vigorous moves, they will not fall out. Long battery life, robust build quality. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liubov

customer_reviews.title: You won't find better for this amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these now for 6 months and love them. I use them every day and am very hard on them. I had an issue with the silicone tips starting to wear down I contacted customer support and had a new set mailed to me within 24 hours. Wonderful service. The product is solidly built, goes louder than I need, fills the ear fully and has amazing sound quality. I will listen with with just one and both together. Turning them on is as simple as holding the button and turning them off, you just have to put them back in the case. Love them. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty left earbud and charging unit shows quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but definitely need quality control. From the first use the left ear bud randomly drops out and the charging unit does not charge the left earbud. The LED does not even blink on the charging unit when the left bud is connecting, which shows that it is not being charged as intended. Completely unacceptable for a $70 piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: mattcav

customer_reviews.title: Worth checking out!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. They come with a range of earbud types and these funky things that follow the groove of your ear. Great battery life, but that means they are pretty large. The biggest complaint I can offer is that it seems other bluetooth devices will cause interference and the phone calls only come in one ear when I make calls using this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, took a chance with the brand and was rewarded
customer_reviews.text: On first listen, the left ear continually dropped out so I was concerned. Not sure if anything happened or changed -- I may have charged it more fully? -- in any case, the initial problem didn't resurface to the same extent when I tried them again in a couple of days, down to a very acceptable one dropout per 90 mins or so. Great sound, impactful bass (use the eartips that seal best for you, no bass without a good seal), better than most Bluetooth headsets for sure (miles better than my Jaybird X2 on sound quality). Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Freeman

customer_reviews.title: These truly wireless Bluetooth ear buds are really quite amazing, they sound great
customer_reviews.text: These truly wireless Bluetooth ear buds are really quite amazing, they sound great.The quality of the sound is very good, and they get pretty loud. wasn't sure if i should take a chance on them at first, but was so glad i did
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds, even greater customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound and compact size of the whole package. Been using it for about six months now and they hold up very well. Sound quality is unbeatable at this price point. The controls on both sides for play/pause and volume come in very handy when your phone is not easily accessible. Recently I lost the charging base on a flight, and reached out to purchase the replacement unit. The whole experience was seamless and quick, and they even offered to replace the component for free. That’s a great customer service! Very happy with the product and the seller, and highly recommend to try these guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the two headphones lag from one another for a split second...but the sound quality & price point outweigh this small issue. LOVE THESE! I purchased 2 other pairs before falling for these! (JLAB True Wireless $50, ROWKIN $100)...I have been having worse lag...but still for $60, they are amazinnngggggggg
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of wireless earbuds from Bose to Monster to Beats to budget earbuds by Monoprice. These are Comfortable, light weight sound great and hold its own against the more pricey earbuds. It is important to find the correct fit for your particular ear even if that means you have to choose two different size buds one for each ear. An improperly fitted earbud will result in outside noise leakage and a rather tinny sound.
customer_reviews.author: deepbluereview

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly set! Sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bluetooth set for my exercise and something i can use while charging my iphone ( as they made only one jack for charging and wire headphones which comes with iphone) This set works just great! Good quality sound and easy to use, once you figure out the functions of the buttons. Charging station looks attractive and has a strap attached to it, which makes it easier to carry around and lessen the chances on losing the whole set. However. I still trying to figure out the correct settings for taking a call.
customer_reviews.author: kocherry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these earbuds. They sound great. When I am on a phone call, l don't get complaints to speak up or the sound is muffled. The best thing for me is when I'm on the plane, just having them in blocks out the chatter and the music sounds clear. My only complaint would be that they don't come in an enclosed case. It bothers me a little when I have store them in backpack or someplace else with them being exposed.
customer_reviews.author: AD2050

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Easily fall out, one earbud always ends up cutting out or disconnecting, decent sound for the price but not great in terms of latency or appearance. I recommend looking for earbuds like the enacfires, they are much better...
customer_reviews.author: Austin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Strong signal and amazing sound quality for a pair of Bluetooth wireless ear buds. The charging base comes with a handy lanyard and provides extra battery charging when on the go if you run out of charge on the earbuds and there is not an electrical outlet available nearby. I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chiron

customer_reviews.title: For the price?  Good
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is overall pretty good, but the bass is on the quiet side. Comparing this with other earbuds under $75, the Treblab X2 is superior. The storage case/external battery is on the small side, so I worry that I might lose it. They fit. I tried a pair (no name from China, I'm embarrassed to admit) that did not fit. That was a wasted $60. Still, with that $60 gone plus the $70 for the Treblab, I'm still coming under the price of the Boase Soundsport.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Had them for 3 months and broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought them 3 months ago and about a week ago I started hearing static in the right ear piece. I thought it would go away if I charged it, so about a day later I went to turn them on to use them and the left one turned on and the right one didn't turn on at all. Now I can't use them at all and they were AMAZING earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these ear buds! I have small ears and these fit great. With both ear buds in they block out most other noise. Sound quality is great especially for base lovers. They charge quickly too :) I only wish they had a carrying case
customer_reviews.author: wendy schell

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, intuitive controls and mini-charging dock/holder. Deep, full, awesome sound through most frequencies. You  a bit, though.
customer_reviews.text: After the earpieces got past some initial high range 'hissing' when I first started using them, they have continued to emit resounding full, deep, and super clear sound when I listen to music. I haven't used them for calls much A sack for the miniature charging dock/secure holder for the buds would've is desirable, but the wrist lanyard is quite good for the dock. Sleek, stylish, and highly functional wireless earbuds are what you get with TrebLab's X2. 'Just remember to be aware of your surroundings visually, because the super clear sound results from isolation from other sound around you, for a chamber effect when using both earpieces for that awesome audio bliss.
customer_reviews.author: James LeRoux

customer_reviews.title: accessories ensure a great fit. pairs easily with devices
customer_reviews.text: accessories ensure a great fit. pairs easily with devices. and sound quality is very good... i was surprised by the strength of the bass in particular. the buds themselves are kind of large and protrude out of your ear a bit, but i'm guessing that's the tradeoff for having the strong sound capability. overall, a this was a great purchase for everything from daily use to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These have got to be one of the best earbuds I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Un-believable!!! I own Jabra sport pace, and beats ear buds. These have got to be one of the best earbuds I have ever owned. Don’t waste your money on name brands, these bad boys will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Zac McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym rat!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone thru at least 4 other Bluetooth earbuds from other manufacturers. These have been the best quality, sound and battery by far in comparison for it's price point. I've had $110 ear buds in the past from another brand and the TRELAB X2 go above and beyond those. The sound quality is incredible. Perfect fitting because of the different options. The charging pods and everything are great. I've had them for at least 6 months and still going strong. I work at a health club so I'm constantly working out and sweating with them . Still working.
customer_reviews.author: John Baruc

customer_reviews.title: Reasons for purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use mainly in Gym. I have an ICD and they suggested the proximity to the device with Bluetooth connectivity should be over 6”. They meet that requirement for me. Seem to be very good quality and looking forward to using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective, wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Con: Headphones worked twice, then can’t hold a charge, nonfunctional within days. Not the most comfortable either. Pro: good sound quality (for the very brief time). Overall: Returning these defectives for money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Earphones!!
customer_reviews.text: So I have to say I am truly impressed by the Treb Lab xfit. They are really comfortableThey are really comfortable required almost no set up, required no set up, Good sound, good Bluetooth connection and very comfortable. I had an issue earlier with a pair of headphones and the trip lab I had an issue earlier with a pair of headphones and the customer service from Treb Lab has been really amazing. I would definitely recommend the exit wireless had your I would definitely recommend the X fit wireless earphones and the company itself. company itself!
customer_reviews.author: nikjc

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Earbuds, long battery life, good quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: From first day up to now I’m falling in love with my new sound, deep bass and unexpected quality and comfort. I think it will be my the best wireless earbuds. Using with Iphone, build in mic helps you answer phone calls right away. Long battery life worth your attention. Thank you for this product ! 5+
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service in Particular Aleksey
customer_reviews.text: My initial reaction to Treblab was not a good one ...BUT Treblab will stand behind their products and work with you to make sure you are satisfied their customer support is just a reminder of what great service is all about buy Treblab you will not be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Aamazon

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad connection
customer_reviews.text: I have no trouble pairing them to the phone. My problem is with the left one cutting out for about 1-2 seconds every couple minutes when I'm walking. Sitting still seems to work fine. It may be interference of some sort. It happens when I'm walking, but it seems like the same areas of the yard while mowing the lawn. Noise cancelling is great though - I don't have to blow out my eardrums while mowing the yard. Also as a Bluetooth for the phone calls the right one works perfectly and this is the primary function for me.
customer_reviews.author: JR S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January. I used it every day for 5 days a week since. The ear pieces ripped up, separated from the plastic and got stuck in my ear a few times. By this time the batteries are quite weak. I cant get 4 hours of use out of them anymore. If you need a bluetooth headset that will last this is NOT it.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub R.

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. The Bluetooth wireless earbuds I have ever had period. They sound better than my friends airpods or any other earbuds I've tried or used.
customer_reviews.author: LA-tin

customer_reviews.title: very bling blingin' phones
customer_reviews.text: i like this product very much so, its exactly whut i needed in my life and am very entertained with its quality's i would recommend this brand to anybody out there listenin in the air, if you dig what i mean.. just superb quality not double but triple thumbs up to treblab technologies for this awesume product, i hope you can find some more bankin materials to make more wireless headphones, one
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Take your time , read instructions, make sure fit is right!
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little bit of time with the fit and it will pay dividends. Patience my brother! Unbelievable sound for size and 5 hr battery life is legit. Recharge block is good idea and convenient to full charge again. Easy
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are awesome, the sound is uniform
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome, the sound is uniform. I use them mainly for exercising so that I don't have to worry about any cords getting wet while Im spinning. they don't fall out of your ears easily they stay put and thats why I will recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: shantel

customer_reviews.title: Treblab X2
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are the best! They're so easy to use, comfortable and practical size to carry around. I use them so much while driving and the battery holds up a lot. The sound is the best i have and the clearest i have ever heard in my life. I recommend them to everyone looking for wireless earbuds that never fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Eugeniu Morcov

customer_reviews.title: These are great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These are great ear buds, I ran 8 miles and they stayed in place perfectly and the sound quality was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: James R Pratt Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying, nothing is perfect yet sound is heavenly
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cosmic sound I have ever heard, great bass(there's definitely some punch to it oof), for the mic the other side people hear me at low volume but its audible and clean just low vol, despite all of that the only issue maybe the left earbud Lags 2-4 times especially when I am walking down the road(cars around) but doesn't happen again. Its one of the best earbuds I've ever used. Lots of love <3 keep er goin.
customer_reviews.author: Drag

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity at work
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I run fork lift so can only use 1 earbud at a time so its great to not have to have them both turned on. Between the both i have music all night. Only real downside is the eartips are a pain to put on but thats just minor.
customer_reviews.author: Goof_87

customer_reviews.title: Superb High End Sound and snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I just received these as my first truly wireless earbuds. THEY ARE AMAZING!!!! I travel with a pair of Bose over-ear noise canceling headphones and nothing has come close until now. Once you get the right fit with the silicone ear fins and use the foam plugs WOW! Amazing bass I cannot turn them up all the way for fear of busting my eardrums. The sound is full of crisp highs and deep bass tones. Very impressed way to go TREBLAB!!
customer_reviews.author: RW Reese

customer_reviews.title: ... using the X2 for two weeks and overall I'm pleased. It was easy to pair and holds a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the X2 for two weeks and overall I'm pleased. It was easy to pair and holds a charge for 3 to 4 hrs. I'm not an expert but to me the sound quality is excellent. I'm very impressed. My only complaint is the left earbud disconnects. This will sometimes happen when the phone is sitting stationary and I'm not moving. So this can not be blamed on the signal be blocked. To reconnect I turn off the right earbud then turn back on. This is my only problem.
customer_reviews.author: jim binkley

customer_reviews.title: so glad i did
customer_reviews.text: Originally orderd these by mistake. Decided to give them a try, so glad i did! I have a pair of Senhiser momentem 2’s that I absolutely love. These little buggers stay right with them. Once you get the proper fitting done, i use the foam ear tips, they block all but the loudest noise. The Sennhiser momentem 2’s are noise canceling and dont work as well as these, i’m impressed and you will be also. Not the sleekest but far superior to apple Airpods in sound!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and Fit
customer_reviews.text: The charging box fell apart when I was taking the earphones out of the box. I made a review saying so and they replaced it right away! Great customer service. Fits amazing but left head phone goes in and out a bit. Other than that great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley T Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for workingout
customer_reviews.text: No wires, It really does have good base. I have Bose noise canceling headphones but I really needed something for workouts, The Treblab X2 fits the bill. You will have to get the fit correct (there are plenty of size options) and push it in good to get the truly good base. I like that it charges even if the charger isn't plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and the packaging is great. I have the Bluetooth headphones and the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and the packaging is great. I have the Bluetooth headphones and the sound quality and wear are awesome for those. So I’m banking that these will be too. Will update after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: QueenMcCombs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing earbuds i ever used,,i highly recommend it,,crystal clear sound with deep bass,,fits well,,, Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, great battery life. I've gotten about 8 hrs out of a single charge. The base is a charger too, gives the earphones one full charge. Nice bass, clear middles and detailed highs. Their price is also great, compared to other true wireless earphones. The mic is almost worthless, so that is an issue that needs to be fixed on the next iteration. At this price level however, they are an excellent choice, no other true wireless earphones have such a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio C

customer_reviews.title: Big but good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are much larger than I expected and lose a point for being fairly ugly compared to other in ear headphones. However the sound quality is good and the battery life has bee good for true wireless options.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zirnhelt

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: The Treblab X2 proved to have very good sound with bass, treble and midranges very clear. Additionally, I had an opportunity to deal with their customer service as I had lost my charger and they were more than helpful and quite pleasant. I would absolutely recommend Treblab X2's.
customer_reviews.author: Roy San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Disconnection sometimes happens.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is super great, the bass is perfect which for me is what I want in a earphone. The quality of them is fantastic as well, definitely worth the price point. The only issue I’ve come across is sometimes the left earphone randomly disconnects at times. Once I turn it off and then turn it back on it’s fine but there’s been some issues about this from other people. It’s stopped for me but just something to take into consideration when checking these out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality and Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that I look like an alien (LOL)...When they are in use, I can't complain one bit about the headphones. The only challenge I have occasionally is using them while on a call. At times the other person was unable to hear me clearly. Sound quality is as good as the source. They were almost noise cancelling due to the airbuds lodged in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg One

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these. So far these are excellent. Considering the low price, these things are excellent! The foam ear tips do a great job at blocking outside sounds. I didn't have to listen to music wide open while mowing to hear it and no ringing of the ears afterwards! Very comfortable, no soreness after 4 hours of constant use. Would recommend these to anyone and will continue to buy from Treblab.
customer_reviews.author: William Anthony Duke II

customer_reviews.title: Bad bet.
customer_reviews.text: One of the earbuds would not hold a charge on first attempt at use. Efforts to recharge also failed. Returning the item to the manufacturer cost 33% of the purchase price, plus the headache of shipping the package. Requiring the customer to pay the shipping suggests that selling a defective product then betting the customer will not go to the expense of sending it back is the actual business model being pursued by this seller.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Capece

customer_reviews.title: and couldn't be happier. - Good sound quality - Excellent range - ...
customer_reviews.text: After going through almost every other brand I got these. I initially didn't get them because of the wait time, and needed a earbud immediately. Finally after being so dissatisfied with everything else I ordered these, and couldn't be happier. - Good sound quality - Excellent range - Easy to use - Recharge storage box great I lost my first pair in the box. Couldn't be happier now regarding my earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound was amazing and the box it all comes in looks great ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound was amazing and the box it all comes in looks great everything perfect. The ear buds are barely noticeable and with all the different size ear peices you can find the perfect fit.i don't know if it was just mine but when I had it to charge in it's charging case they would turn on automatically so I had to have the case plugged in. Over all I recommend these ear buds and this companys brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Quality from a great brand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought treblab rf100 a long time ago. I loved them. Great price and sound quality. Recently my girlfriend needed some new earbuds. So I figured I'd find her something good. I checked to see what treblab had to offer and found these truly wireless earbuds. Love the sound and battery life is great for their size. Got her and myself a pair. As always treblab makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA STANCE

product_meta.title: TREBLAB X2 - Genuine True Wireless Earbuds: 3D Sound Quality, Noise Isolating Ear Tips, Charging Case, Mic Siri/Google. Best Cordless Bluetooth Headphones for Running. Top 10 Fully Wireless Earbuds
feature_bullets: HIGH-END BERYLLIUM TRUE WIRELESS EARBUDS – Experience nothing but pure genuine sound in all frequency ranges, delivered by breakthrough speaker technology and noise cancelling ear tips. We have made the speakers out of beryllium, an element that delivers breakthrough sound quality and used in professional audio equipment only. Our premium truly wireless earbuds are out of competition!

CORDLESS HEADPHONES MADE FOR SPORTS - TREBLAB X2 wireless headphones are perfect for sport and gym workouts. They are best bluetooth headphones for running, jogging and fitness. X2 are super comfortable and we included our special xDrop ear-fins so they won't fall out. Our sports earbuds are sweat proof and IPX4 waterproof (waterproof bluetooth headphones) which makes them perfect for any type of active exercises.

AWESOME CONNECTION - TREBLAB X2 in-ear wireless headphones come with advanced Bluetooth (blue tooth) technology for an unbreakable connection with your Android or iOS device, Mac or PC. Use your fully wireless earbuds to get things done on the go, with in-ear calls, mic, volume and SIRI/Google (Android) support.

✔ A BATTERY THAT CAN KEEP UP - Don't worry about running out of battery as X2 plays for an incredible 5 HOURS straight, and comes with a charging case that provides two additional charges, wherever you are.

✔ 1-YEAR WARRANTY – We will completely refund your order if you are not satisfied with the purchase. We offer 1 year warranty, lifetime support and up to 3 FREE accessories replacements for cordless earphones within 12 months. For California Residents Only: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm – P65Warnings ca gov.
